data: `minecraft:behavior.skeleton_horse_trap` allows an entity to function as a Skeleton horse trap and be triggered like them, spawning a lightning bolt, additional skeleton horses and skeleton horse riders when a player gets nearby.
This behavior can only be used by the `horse`, `mule`, `donkey` and `skeleton horses` entity type.

data.Name: duration
data.Description: Amount of time in seconds the trap exists. After this amount of time is elapsed, the trap is removed from the world if it hasn't been activated

data.Name: within_radius
data.Description: Distance in blocks that the player has to be within to trigger the horse trap
